unknown_error.message: Something went wrong! Please try again!

popup_html_register.message:
Steem Keychain is a better way to access your STEEM accounts. Simple. Lightweight. Secure.

Let's start by creating a Keychain password. You will need this password to access or make changes to your account(s).

popup_html_unlock.message:
It's a better way to access your STEEM accounts. Simple. Lightweight. Secure.

Be Free and Steem On.

popup_html_reset_desc.message: If you forgot your password, you can clear your data but will have to enter all your keys again.

popup_html_estimation_info_text.message:
The estimated account value is a ballpark idea of what your funds are worth in USD.

Please note that the value does not take into account pending market trades, transfers, or transactions.
popup_html_estimation_info_text.description: on popup main page, click info near estimated value

popup_html_setup_text.message:
Enter your Steem account name and either the master password or the private posting or active key for that account below. Your master password will NOT be saved and will only be used to generate your private keys.

You may add / remove Steem accounts or keys at any time. If you need to create a new Steem account, you can do so at https://signup.steemit.com/.

popup_html_import_success.message:
Import successful!

Please select the Keys you wish to store with Steem Keychain:
popup_html_import_success.description: When adding an account via master key

popup_html_posting.description: When adding an account via master key

popup_html_active.description: When adding an account via master key

popup_html_memo.description: When adding an account via master key

popup_html_posting_info.description: When adding an account via master key

popup_html_active_info.description: When adding an account via master key

popup_html_memo_info.description: When adding an account via master key

popup_html_al_default_info.message: Lock the keychain manually or when the browser is closed.

popup_html_al_locked_info.message: Auto-lock the keychain when the device locks.

popup_html_al_idle_info.message: Auto-lock the keychain after the browser window is idle for the specified number of minutes.

popup_html_keychainify_text.message: This feature allows you to trigger a Steem Keychain operation when clicking on a supported link on a web page or accessing the URL directly in a browser tab.

popup_html_enable_keychainify_info.message: Currently only support Steem Connect transfers URLs.

popup_html_import_export_text.message:
You can export all your keys encrypted in a file. This will allow you to import them to Keychain on another device or simply safeguard them.

When importing, only accounts that are not already present on the instance will be added.

popup_html_about_text.message: The overall idea and concept for the Steem Keychain browser extension was created by @yabapmatt who is a developer and witness on the Steem blockchain. It was primarily developed by @stoodkev who is also a Steem developer (SteemPlus) and witness. The design and development were funded by @aggroed (a top 20 Steem witness) and @yabapmatt through their joint business Splinterlands, which is a blockchain-based collectible trading card game built on top of the Steem blockchain. Be sure to check it out at https://splinterlands.io!

popup_html_pref_info.message: View and update the websites and transaction types for which you have opted not to recieve a confirmation prompt.

popup_html_add_key.description: on manage accounts, add a previously non stored key

popup_html_add_key_text.message: Add the private key to your account. You can also add it by entering your master key.
popup_html_add_key_text.description: on preferences, within span will be posting/memo/active

popup_html_copied.description: on preferences when clicking on a key

popup_html_change_password_text.message: Input your old password for confirmation, then chose a new password.

popup_html_transfer_funds.description: When initiating a STEEM or SBD transfer

popup_html_balance.description: When initiating a STEEM or SBD transfer. $1 is a variable that will be replaced by a currency name.

popup_html_loading.description: When initiating a STEEM or SBD transfer and the balance is loading.

popup_html_memo_optional.description: When initiating a STEEM or SBD transfer

popup_html_encrypt_memo.description: When initiating a STEEM or SBD transfer

popup_html_add_active.message: Please add an active key to send STEEM or SBD.
popup_html_add_active.description: When trying to send STEEM or SBD but active key was not stored

popup_html_transfer_confirm_text.message:
Please confirm your transfer.
This cannot be undone.

popup_html_not_now.description: On claim reward page (click little gift icon from main page when rewards are available to claim)

popup_html_redeem.description: On claim reward page (click little gift icon from main page when rewards are available to claim)

popup_html_witness_disclaimer.message: You may vote for up to 30 witnesses.

popup_html_witness_voted.description: On witness page. Tab name, keep short

popup_html_witness_top.description: On witness page. Tab name, keep short

popup_html_witness_add.description: On witness page. Tab name, keep short

popup_html_proxy_desc.message: You may manually enter a user to vote for Witness or to set as Proxy.

popup_html_tokens_settings_text.message: View token information and chose which tokens to display. Learn more about custom tokens on the Steem blockchain at https://steem-engine.net.

popup_html_tokens_send_text.message: Sending your tokens may take up to 30 seconds to confirm, please be patient.

popup_html_token_confirm_text.message:
Please confirm your transfer.
This cannot be undone.

popup_html_current.description: Main page > Power Up . Current SP balance

popup_html_powerup_text.message: Power Up your STEEM to transform it in Steem Power.

popup_html_powerdown_text.message: Power Down your Steem Power to get liquid STEEM. The entire Power Down process will take 13 weeks.

popup_html_powering_down.description: Main page > Power Down. When a power down has been started

popup_html_delegations_text.message: You may delegate your Steem Power (SP) to another user. Click on the Outgoing amount to review or make changes.

popup_html_incoming.description: Main page > Delegate. Incoming delegations ($1 is a variable, should be SP)

popup_html_delegate_to_user.description: Main page > Delegate. Confirm a delegation

popup_html_total_outgoing.description: Main page > Delegate > Click on Outgoing

popup_html_total_incoming.description: Main page > Delegate > Click on Incoming

popup_html_edit_delegations.description: Main page > Delegate > Click on Outgoing > Edit one of the outgoing delegations

popup_html_edit_delegations_text.message: You are changing the amount delegated to this user. Edit the amount and save your change.
popup_html_edit_delegations_text.description: Main page > Delegate > Click on Outgoing > Edit one of the outgoing delegations

popup_html_support.message: Click here to support Steem Keychain development by casting your witness votes for the creators!
popup_html_support.description: Support text on the bottom of popup. If you already voted yabapmatt aggroed and stoodkev for witnesses it wont show.

popup_accounts_no_bittrex.description: instead of estimated value, if cant reach bittrex api

popup_accounts_incorrect_key.description: when adding new account with incorrect key

popup_accounts_fill.description: when adding new account but not filling all fields

popup_accounts_already_have_key.description: when trying to add a new key for the account (in manage accounts), but the key is already there. $1 can stand for active memo or posting

popup_accounts_not_your_key.description: Trying to add the wrong key from manage accounts.  $1 can stand for active memo or posting

popup_accounts_not_wif.message: This is not a private WIF!

dialog_no_prompt_verify.description: When a website request a verification using posting key and you dont want it to pop all the time

dialog_no_prompt.message: Do not prompt again to send $1 transactions from the @$2 account on $3
dialog_no_prompt.description: When a website request a transaction using posting key and you dont want it to pop all the time

dialog_desc_verify.message: The website $1 would like to verify that you have access to the private $2 key for the account: @$3

dialog_desc_sign.message: The website $1 would like to sign a message using the $2 key for the account: @$3

bgd_lifecycle_request_canceled.message: Request was canceled by the user.

bgd_auth_locked_desc.message: The current website is trying to send a request to the Steem Keychain browser extension. Please enter your password below to unlock the wallet and continue.

bgd_auth_canceled.message: Request was canceled by the user.

bgd_auth_transfer_no_active.message: The current website is trying to send a transfer request to the Steem Keychain browser extension for account @$1 using the active key, which has not been added to the wallet.

bgd_auth_transfer_no_memo.message: The current website is trying to send a request to the Steem Keychain browser extension for account @$1 using the memo key, which has not been added to the wallet.

bgd_auth_no_account.message: The current website is trying to send a request to the Steem Keychain browser extension for account @$1 which has not been added to the wallet.

bgd_auth_no_key.message: The current website is trying to send a request to the Steem Keychain browser extension for account @$1 using the $2 key, which has not been added to the wallet.

bgd_ops_error_broadcasting.message: There was an error broadcasting this transaction, please try again.

bgd_ops_error.message: There was an error broadcasting this transaction:

bgd_ops_tokens.message: The transaction has been broadcasted successfully. Please check your balance to confirm that it was processed succesfully.

bgd_ops_pd.message: Started a $1 SP power down on @$2.

bgd_ops_undelegate.message: Succesfully stopped the delegation to @$1 from account @$2.

bgd_ops_sign_tx.message: The transaction has been signed successfully.

bgd_ops_add_auth.message: Succesfully gave $1 authority to @$2 on account @$3.

bgd_ops_remove_auth.message: Succesfully removed $1 authority from @$2 on account @$3.

popup_account_redeem.description: On claim reward page (click little gift icon from main page when rewards are available to claim)

popup_html_add_by_auth.context: When adding new account. In a button, must keep short.

popup_html_chose_add_method.message:
You can add your keys by entring a private key or your master password.
Alternatively, you can specify an authorized account.

popup_html_auth_text.message: Add the new account by specifying an account that has authority over it, and that is already saved in Steem Keychain.
popup_html_auth_text.context: On Add new account => via auth

popup_html_auth_placeholder_username_aut.context: The placeholder for the authorized account that will use its keys for this account.

popup_accounts_no_auth.context: When trying to add an account via authority

import_html_text.message:
Import your keys from another Keychain instance using a .kc file.

You need to use the same master password on both instances to decrypt the keys.

import_html_error.message:
There was an error importing your keys.
Make sure you that you are using the same master key than when you exported the file.
